BiblioEntry.Title: Loop near-rings and unique decompositions of H-spaces
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Loop near-rings and unique decompositions of H-spaces / Damir Franetič, Petar Pavešić
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Za vsak H-prostor ▫$X$▫ ima množica homotopskih razredov preslikav ▫$X$▫ vase naravno algebraično strukturo skoraj-kolobarja. Čeprav je v splošnem stuktura skoraj-kolobarjev zelo zapletena, tisti, ki so porojeni z endomorfizmi H-prostorov so dovolj sorodni običajnim kolobarjem, da dopuščajo teorijo razcepov Krull-Schmidtovega tipa, le-to pa lahko uporabimo pri izrekih o razcepih H-prostorov. Kot posledico razcepov modulov nad skoraj-kolobarji izpeljemo izreke o enoličnih razcepih H-prostorov. Dodatno lahko dobimo rezultate o razcepih za nekatere neskončne produkte H-prostor zahvaljujoč nekaterim recentnim rezultatom teorije neskončnih produktov. Na koncu pokažemo, da so nerazcepni ▫$p$▫-lokalni H-prostori avtomatično tudi krepko nerazcepni, kar nas pripelje do preprostega alternativnega dokaza klasičnih izrekov o enolični faktorizaciji C. Wilkersona in B. Graya.

For every H-space ▫$X$▫ the set of homotopy classes ▫$[X,X]$▫ possesses a natural algebraic structure of a loop near-ring. Albeit one cannot say much about general loop near-rings, it turns out that those that arise from H-spaces are sufficiently close to rings to have a viable Krull-Schmidt type decomposition theory, which is then reflected into decomposition results of H-spaces. In the paper we develop the algebraic theory of local loop near-rings and derive an algebraic characterization of indecomposable and strongly indecomposable H-spaces. As a consequence, we obtain unique decomposition theorems for products of H-spaces. In particular, we are able to treat certain infinite products of H-spaces, thanks to a recent breakthrough in the Krull-Schmidt theory for infinite products. Finally, we show that indecomposable finite ▫$p$▫-local H-spaces are automatically strongly indecomposable, which leads to an easy alternative proof of classical unique decomposition theorems of Wilkerson and Gray.

BiblioEntry.Title: A Krull-Schmidt theorem for infinite products of modules
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: A Krull-Schmidt theorem for infinite products of modules / Damir Franetič
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Dokažemo izrek o enoličnem razcepu za direktne produkte končno generiranih modulov nad določenimi razredi kolobarjev, ki je analogen klasičnemu Krull-Schmidt-Remak-Azumaya izreku za direktne vsote modulov.

We prove a unique decomposition theorem for direct products of finitely generated modules over certain classes of rings, which is analogous to the classical Krull-Schmidt-Remak-Azumaya theorem for direct-sum decompositions of modules.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: ozek modul /polperfekten koloba /razcep modula na direktni produkt /Krull-Schmidt-Remak-Azumaya izrek

BiblioEntry.Title: H-spaces, semiperfect rings and self-homotopy equivalences
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: H-spaces, semiperfect rings and self-homotopy equivalences / Damir Franetič, Petar Pavešić

BiblioSet.Title: Proceedings. Section A, Mathematics
BiblioSet.Keytitle: Proc. R. Soc. Edinb., Sect. A, Math.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Teorijo polperfektnih kolobarjev uporabimo za dokaz izrekov o razcepih H- in koH-prostorov in s tem posplošimo Wilkesonove rezultate. Dognanja nato uporabimo v dokazu reducibilnosti homotopskih avtoekvivalenc za poljuben ▫$p$▫-lokalen H- oziroma koH-prostor.

We use the theory of semiperfect rings to derive decomposition theorems for H-and co-H-spaces, generalizing the results of Wilkerson. The results are then used to prove reducibility of self-homotopy equivalences for arbitrary ▫$p$▫-local H- and co-H-spaces.

BiblioList.Title: 1.12 Objavljeni povzetek znanstvenega prispevka na konferenci

BiblioEntry.Title: Semiperfect rings and unique decompositions of coH-spaces
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Semiperfect rings and unique decompositions of coH-spaces / Damir Franetič ; joint work with Petar Pavešić

AuthorGroup.CorpAuthor: Dubrovnik VII -- Geometric Topology, June 26 - July 3, 2011, Inter-University Centre, Dubrovnik, Croatia

BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Abstracts / Dubrovnik VII - Geometric Topology, Dubrovnik, June 26 - July 3, 2011

BiblioEntry.Title: Lokalnost homotopskih endomorfizmov : doktorska disertacija
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Lokalnost homotopskih endomorfizmov : doktorska disertacija / Damir Franetič ; Petar Pavešić (mentor)
BiblioEntry.Subtitle: doktorska disertacija

Notes.Dissertation: Univ. v Ljubljani, Fak. za matematiko in fiziko, Odd. za matematiko

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Študiramo zvezo med ▫$\lor$▫-razcepi koH-prostora ▫$C$▫ ter razcepi enice na vsoto paroma ortogonalnih idempotentov v sliki reprezentacije ▫$[C,C] \to \text{End}(H_\ast(G))$▫. Pokažemo, da je slika te reprezentacije polperfekten kolobar za vsak končen ▫$p$▫-lokalen koH-prostor ▫$C$▫, od koder sledi krepka različica Wilkersonovega izreka. Osnova za razpravo je opis algebrske strukture na ▫$[C,C]$▫, ki jo imenujemo zančni skoraj kolobar. Vpeljemo lokalne zančne skoraj kolobarje in dokažemo izrek o enoličnosi ▫$\lor$▫-razcepov koH-prostorov, ki je povsem analogen Krull-Schmidt-Azumayinemu izreku za module. Dualni rezultati veljajo za H-prostore.

The relationship between ▫$\lor$▫-decompositions of a coH-space ▫$C$▫ and decompositions of the identity as a sum of pairwise orthogonal idempotents in the image of the representation ▫$[C,C] \to \text{End}(H_\ast(G))$▫ is studied. We show that the image of this representation is a semiperfect ring for every finite $p$-local coH-space ▫$C$▫, which implies a strong form of Wilkerson's theorem. The discussion is based on the description of the algebraic structure ▫$[C,C]$▫, which is called a loop near-ring. Local loop near-rings are introduced, and a theorem of unique ▫$\lor$▫-decompositions of coH-spaces, which is completely analogous to the Krull-Schidt-Azumaya theorem for modules, is proven. Dual results hold for H-spaces.

mathematics /algebraic theory /algebraic loop /loop near-ring /quasiregular element /local ring /idempotent /direct sum decomposition /semiperfect ring /exchange ring /potent ring /loop object /coloop object /H-space /coH-space /▫$p$▫-localization /rationalization

BiblioEntry.Title: Nov dokaz Bottove periodičnosti : diplomsko delo
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Nov dokaz Bottove periodičnosti : diplomsko delo / Damir Franetič
BiblioEntry.Subtitle: diplomsko delo

Notes.Dissertation: Univ. Ljubljana, Fakulteta za matematiko in fiziko, Matematika - teoretična smer (UNI)

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V delu je predstavljen dokaz Bottove periodičnosti, ki temelji na konstrukciji kvazivlaknenja nad ▫$\mathrm{U}$▫ s kontraktibilnim totalnim prostorom in vlaknom ▫$\mathrm{BU} \times \ZZ$▫. Podani so tudi podrobni opisi prostorov ▫$\mathrm{U}$▫, ▫$\mathrm{BU}$▫ in ▫$\mathrm{BU} \times \ZZ$▫.

We present a proof of the Bott periodicity theorem, based on the construction of a quasifibration over ▫$\mathrm{U}$▫ with contractible total space and ▫$\mathrm{BU} \times \ZZ$▫ as fiber. We also give detailed descriptions of spaces ▫$\mathrm{U}$▫, ▫$\mathrm{BU}$▫ and ▫$\mathrm{BU} \times \ZZ$▫.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: quasifibration /topological K-theory /Bott periodicity /spaces of matrices /groups of matrices
